properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITAL_RV A WHERE A.HP_RV_STATUS = 'PUBLIC'

SELECT A.HP_RV_NO , A.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , A.HP_RV_TITLE , A.HP_RV_CONTENT , A.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HP_RV_WATCHED , A.MEM_NAME , A.HP_RV_MEM_NO , A.HP_RV_STATUS , A.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , A.FILE_PATH FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.HP_RV_NO , B.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , B.HP_RV_TITLE , B.HP_RV_CONTENT , B.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , B.HP_RV_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , B.HP_RV_MEM_NO , B.HP_RV_STATUS , B.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , B.FILE_PATH FROM (SELECT C.HP_RV_NO , C.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , C.HP_RV_TITLE , C.HP_RV_CONTENT , C.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , C.HP_RV_WATCHED , D.MEM_NAME , C.HP_RV_MEM_NO , C.HP_RV_STATUS , C.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , E.FILE_PATH FROM HOSPITAL_RV C JOIN MEM_INFO D ON(C.HP_RV_MEM_NO = D.MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN V_THUMBNAIL_FILE E ON(C.HP_RV_NO = E.BD_NO AND C.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO = E.BD_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE C.HP_RV_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY C.HP_RV_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE HOSPITAL_RV A SET A.HP_RV_WATCHED = (SELECT B.HP_RV_WATCHED + 1 FROM HOSPITAL_RV B WHERE B.HP_RV_NO = ? ) WHERE A.HP_RV_NO = ?

SELECT A.HP_RV_NO , A.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , A.HP_RV_TITLE , A.HP_RV_CONTENT , A.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HP_RV_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , A.HP_RV_MEM_NO , A.HP_RV_STATUS , A.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , C.FILE_PATH FROM HOSPITAL_RV A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON(A.HP_RV_MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO C ON(A.HP_RV_NO = C.BD_NO AND A.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO = C.BD_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE A.HP_RV_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITAL_RV A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON (A.HP_RV_MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) WHERE A.HP_RV_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' AND B.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITAL_RV A WHERE A.HP_RV_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' AND A.HP_RV_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITAL_RV A WHERE A.HP_RV_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' AND A.HP_RV_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT A.HP_RV_NO , A.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , A.HP_RV_TITLE , A.HP_RV_CONTENT , A.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HP_RV_WATCHED , A.MEM_NAME , A.HP_RV_MEM_NO , A.HP_RV_STATUS , A.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , A.FILE_PATH FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.HP_RV_NO , B.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , B.HP_RV_TITLE , B.HP_RV_CONTENT , B.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , B.HP_RV_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , B.HP_RV_MEM_NO , B.HP_RV_STATUS , B.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , B.FILE_PATH FROM (SELECT C.HP_RV_NO , C.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , C.HP_RV_TITLE , C.HP_RV_CONTENT , C.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , C.HP_RV_WATCHED , D.MEM_NAME , C.HP_RV_MEM_NO , C.HP_RV_STATUS , C.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , E.FILE_PATH FROM HOSPITAL_RV C JOIN MEM_INFO D ON(C.HP_RV_MEM_NO = D.MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN V_THUMBNAIL_FILE E ON(C.HP_RV_NO = E.BD_NO AND C.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO = E.BD_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE C.HP_RV_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY C.HP_RV_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.HP_RV_NO , A.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , A.HP_RV_TITLE , A.HP_RV_CONTENT , A.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HP_RV_WATCHED , A.MEM_NAME , A.HP_RV_MEM_NO , A.HP_RV_STATUS , A.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , A.FILE_PATH FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.HP_RV_NO , B.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , B.HP_RV_TITLE , B.HP_RV_CONTENT , B.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , B.HP_RV_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , B.HP_RV_MEM_NO , B.HP_RV_STATUS , B.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , B.FILE_PATH FROM (SELECT C.HP_RV_NO , C.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , C.HP_RV_TITLE , C.HP_RV_CONTENT , C.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , C.HP_RV_WATCHED , D.MEM_NAME , C.HP_RV_MEM_NO , C.HP_RV_STATUS , C.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , E.FILE_PATH FROM HOSPITAL_RV C JOIN MEM_INFO D ON(C.HP_RV_MEM_NO = D.MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN V_THUMBNAIL_FILE E ON(C.HP_RV_NO = E.BD_NO AND C.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO = E.BD_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE C.HP_RV_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY C.HP_RV_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.HP_RV_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.HP_RV_NO , A.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , A.HP_RV_TITLE , A.HP_RV_CONTENT , A.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HP_RV_WATCHED , A.MEM_NAME , A.HP_RV_MEM_NO , A.HP_RV_STATUS , A.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , A.FILE_PATH FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.HP_RV_NO , B.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , B.HP_RV_TITLE , B.HP_RV_CONTENT , B.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , B.HP_RV_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , B.HP_RV_MEM_NO , B.HP_RV_STATUS , B.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , B.FILE_PATH FROM (SELECT C.HP_RV_NO , C.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , C.HP_RV_TITLE , C.HP_RV_CONTENT , C.HP_RV_DRAWUP_DATE , C.HP_RV_WATCHED , D.MEM_NAME , C.HP_RV_MEM_NO , C.HP_RV_STATUS , C.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT , E.FILE_PATH FROM HOSPITAL_RV C JOIN MEM_INFO D ON(C.HP_RV_MEM_NO = D.MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN V_THUMBNAIL_FILE E ON(C.HP_RV_NO = E.BD_NO AND C.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO = E.BD_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE C.HP_RV_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY C.HP_RV_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.HP_RV_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO HOSPITAL_RV ( HP_RV_NO , HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO , HP_RV_TITLE , HP_RV_CONTENT , HP_RV_MEM_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_HP_RV_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE HOSPITAL_RV A SET A.HP_RV_STATUS = 'DELETE' WHERE A.HP_RV_STATUS IN ('PUBLIC','PRIVATE') AND A.HP_RV_NO = ?

UPDATE /* creation.board.model.dao.HPFAQBoardDAO#updateBoard() */ HOSPITAL_RV A SET A.HP_RV_TITLE = ? , A.HP_RV_CONTENT = ? , A.HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO = ? WHERE HP_RV_STATUS IN ('PUBLIC', 'PRIVATE') AND HP_RV_NO = ?
